name: Manlandia
declaringWar: Your days of oppressing the common people are at an end.
attacked: I see that peaceful reform is not possible. Inciting revolution is our only recourse now.
defeated: Like my legendary namesake, I shall retire to my last sanctuary, until the day comes when the people need me once more.
introduction: Hail, stranger. I am Arthur, and I welcome you to Camelot, the last redoubt of liberty. Let us set aside the burdens of the past and forge a brighter future together.
denounced: I advise you to abandon the falsehoods you cling to, if you are even capable.
declaringFriendship: Let us stand united against those who still pursue evil ends.
tradeRequest: The Round Table offers this arrangement. Are you interested?
uniques: [Low Tech] units gain the [Powered Armor] promotion
